    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/add",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> addUser(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String documentId,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String firstName,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String lastName)
        Adds user to database
        Parameters:
        documentId - User's serial number of identity card
        email - User e-mail
        password - User password
        firstName - First name
        lastName - Last name
        Returns:
        If user doesn't already exist in database information "User has been added". Otherwise "User already exists in database"

      • getAllUsers

                method=GET)
public java.util.List<com.example.demo.user.entity.User> getAllUsers()
        Displays all users in database
        Returns:
        List of users in database in JSON format

      • authenticateUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/authenticate",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> authenticateUser(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String password)
        Authenticates users
        Parameters:
        email - User e-mail
        password - User password
        Returns:
        If user exists in database and e-mail and password are correct - all information about the user in JSON format. Otherwise information "User doesn't exist, login or password is invalid or user is not validated"

      • validateUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/validate",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity validateUser(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                             java.lang.String documentId)
        Makes user account validated
        Parameters:
        documentId - User's serial number of identity document
        Returns:
        If user exists in database information "User has been validated". Otherwise "User not found"
